MICRO
c BOOTSTRAP
m00 0000000000011100001100000000000111010111	SW+0->PC,MAR
m01 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000	NEXT(PC)
 c LDA $K,X
m02 0000000000010100001100000000010111011110	PC+1->-C,MAR
m03 0000000000010100000100010000000011011101	MDR+X->NOP,MAR
m04 0000000000011100001100000010000110011101	MDR+0->ACC
m05 0000000000010100001100000000010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m06 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000	NEXT(PC)
 c LDX #K
m07 0000000000010100001100000000010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m08 0000000000011100001100000001000110011101	MDR+0->X
m09 0000000000010100001100000000010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m0a 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000	NEXT(PC)
 c INX
m0b 0000000000010100001100010001010110011110	X+1->RAMF,X
m0c 0000000000010100001100000000010111011110	PX+1->PC,MAR
m0d 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000	NEXT(PC)
 c CMPX #Y
m0e 0000000000010100001100000000010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m0f 0000000000010100100100100000000010111101	X-MDR->NOP,NSTATUS
m10 0000000000010100001100000000010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m11 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000	NEXT(PC)
 c STA $K,X
m12 0000000000010100001100000000010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m13 0000000000010100000100010000000011011101	MDR+X->NOP,MAR
m14 0000000000010000000100100000000000010100	ACC+0->NOP,MWE~
m15 0000000000010100001100000000010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m16 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000	NEXT(PC)
 c ADC $K,X
m17 0000000000010100001100000000010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m18 0000000000010100000100010000000011011101	MDR+X->NOP,MAR
m19 0000000000010100001100100010000110111001	MDR+ACC->ACC,NSTATUS,CARRYE~
m1a 0000000000010100001100000000010111011110	PC+1->PC, MAR
m1b 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000	NEXT(PC)
 c CRC
m1c 0000000000011100000100000000010010111110	Z+1->NOP,NSTATUS
m1d 0000000000010100001100000000010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m1e 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000	NEXT(PC)
 c BRNZ $K
m1f 0001101101110100001100000000010111011110	BRmacroZ[setZ],PC+1->PC,MAR
m20 0000000000011100001100000000000111011101	MDR+0->PC,MAR
m21 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000	NEXT(PC)
m22 0000000000010100001100000000010111011110	[setZ]: PC+2->PC,MAR (+4)
m23 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000	NEXT(PC)
 c SHLA
m24 0000000000001100011100000010000110011111	ACC+0->ACC,SRAMU,SH~
m25 0000000000010100001100000000010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m26 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000	NEXT(PC)

MAPPER
m00 02 LDA $K,X
m01 07 LDX #K
m02 0b INX 
m03 0e CMPX #Y
m04 12 STA $K,X
m05 17 ADC $K,X
m06 1c CRC
m07 1f BRNZ $K
m08 24 SHLA 
m09 26 HALT 

MAIN
m00 01	LDX #K
m01 00
m02 00	LDA $K,X
m03 0f	
m04 08	SHLA
m05 05	ADC$K,X
m06 17
m07 04	STA$K,X
m08 1f
m09 02	INX
m0a 03	CMPX #Y
m0b 09
m0c 07	BRNZ $K
m0d 02
m0e 09	HALT
m0f 02	Z
m10 03
m11 05
m12 07
m13 07
m14 06
m15 01
m16 06
m17 01	Y
m18 01
m19 00
m1a 06
m1b 02
m1c 07
m1d 06
m1e 02
m1f 00	W
m20 00
m21 00
m22 00
m23 00
m24 00
m25 00
m26 00
